import React,{Component}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';class Backtotop extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.state={};}// Back to top
componentDidMount(){window.addEventListener('scroll',()=>{this.setState({isTop:window.scrollY>300});},false);}scrollToTop(){window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:"smooth"});}render(){const backtotop=this.state.isTop?'active':'';return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"#",className:"back-to-top ".concat(backtotop),id:"backToTop",onClick:()=>this.scrollToTop()},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:"fal fa-angle-double-up"}));}}export default Backtotop;
